properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sadaka yetu ya
mkate na divai,
tunakutolea Baba
mbele yako,
twakuomba Baba
Mungu pokea.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ni fedha kutoka
mifukoni mwetu,
hizo ni juhudi za
mikono yetu,
twakuomba Baba
Mungu pokea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nafaka kutoka
mashambani mwetu,
nazo ni juhudi za
mikono yetu,
twakuomba Baba
Mungu pokea.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tunaleta kwako
na maombi yetu,
na matatizo
yanayotusumbua,
twakuomba Baba
Mungu pokea.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Tunaleta kwako
udhaifu wetu,
tunaleta kwako
na magonjwa yetu,
twakuomba Baba
Mungu pokea.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Huruma yako ndiyo
faraja kwetu,
mapendo yako ndiyo
faraja kwetu,
twakuomba Baba
Mungu pokea.
